thread.title: University of Northampton graduate’s paint-a-thon for hospital that saved her life (University of Northampton)
thread.title_full: University of Northampton graduate’s paint-a-thon for hospital that saved her life (University of Northampton) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: University of Northampton graduate’s paint-a-thon for hospital that saved her life (University of Northampton)
text: ( Source : University of Northampton ) ​​A Fine Art graduate from the University of Northampton is aiming to raise thousands of pounds for the hospital where she received a life-saving operation to remove a tumour on her spine. Sophie
